article_title: Age is not the only risk for severe coronavirus disease - KKTV 11 News
article_description: Older people remain most at risk of dying as the new coronavirus continues its rampage around the globe  but they re far from the only ones vulnerable
article_content: WASHINGTON  AP  Older people remain most at risk of dying as the new coronavirus continues its rampage around the globe  but theyre far from the only ones vulnerable  One of many mysteries  Men seem to be faring worse than women And as cases skyrocket in th   6356 chars
